message_catalog.msg: Sign in with a pre-registered passkey instead of a password
If passkey sign-in does not work: run diagnostics and send the report!
Register a new passkey on this device for passwordless sign-in
Register an additional passkey on this device
When you register a passkey on this device, you can sign in without a password using the device's built-in authentication (such as fingerprint, Face ID, or a security key, depending on the device).
